shortdesc.ph: Callback for reporting built-in encryption errors.

section.p: After calling to enable encryption, if an error occurs during encryption or decryption on the sender or receiver side, the SDK triggers this callback.
If an error occurs during encryption or decryption after calling to enable encryption, the SDK triggers this callback on the sender or receiver side.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when an error occurs during encryption or decryption.

plentry.pd:
Error type:
ENCRYPTION_ERROR_INTERNAL_FAILURE (0): Internal reason.
ENCRYPTION_ERROR_DECRYPTION_FAILURE (1): Media stream decryption error. Ensure the receiver and sender use the same encryption mode and key.
ENCRYPTION_ERROR_ENCRYPTION_FAILURE (2): Media stream encryption error.
ENCRYPTION_ERROR_DATASTREAM_DECRYPTION_FAILURE (3): Data stream decryption error. Ensure the receiver and sender use the same encryption mode and key.
ENCRYPTION_ERROR_DATASTREAM_ENCRYPTION_FAILURE (4): Data stream encryption error.
